Key Match Events: Bangladesh needed 11 runs from the last six deliveries; Taskin Ahmed faced the last ball and managed only one run; South Africa defended a low total of 113-6; Keshav Maharaj bowled a crucial final over with two wickets and six runs
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa stayed unbeaten with a third win; Bangladesh's first loss kept them in second place
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on June 10, 2024; the pitch was typically tough for batting
